page.title: 19A TYPICAL FRIDAY.BY SARAH.
page.content: I wake up in the morning and I play with my three dolls,Tina,Sally and Lucy.Afterwards I go downstairs and have Cocopops,apple juice and bread and honey for breakfast.I go upstairs and get dressed. Today I am wearing my checked dress and my white socks and sandals.I brush my teeth,comb my hair and wash my face.Then I go back downstairs and get my satchel and swimming bag.We go to school in Julie's car. At school we have an assembly.When we get back we do times tables..After swimming we have a short break and then we go home for lunch.When we come back we do some work.After break we have a short story,then we say prayers and we go home. After school I play with my friend and then have my tea.Finally I get undressed,have a wash and go to bed.
